description.value:
You run and climb across ropes and rigging almost as easily as on the ground. You gain a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Climb] Speed of 15 feet, but only on ship's rigging or similar ropes.

Whenever you succeed at an Athletics check to Climb a rope or an Acrobatics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Balance] on a rope, you get a critical success instead. You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] while Climbing or Balancing on a rope.
